venue.name: City Table at the Lenox Hotel

item.description:
Will there be Natives attending this unusual Benefit party for Community Servings at City Table in the Lenox Hotel from 6-9 pm on Wednesday, March 2, 2011?

To wrap up Community Servings Sponsor My Stache fundraiser, they will be having a Mustachio Bashio Party to thank all of the growers, raise money for Community Servings, and to celebrate all things mustachioed! With your $50.00 ticket enjoy complimentary cocktails, hors d'oeuvres and help the judge Jenny Johnson of NECN pick the best mustaches. Gentleman and ladies who arrive mustachioed will be entered into a special raffle for a chance to win a fabulous prize.

Natives and their guests must purchase their tickets in advance on the Community Servings web site.

Additional information about Community Servings, the event and Mustache Growing Contest is available on line or by contacting Megan Lerner at mlerner@servings.org or 617-522-7777.

Men who wish to be a part of the contest must enter by February 1 by contacting Community Servings.

Several of us attended other years parties (with an election theme) and it was one of the best fundraisers that I attended during 2009!
item.how_to_find_us: E Mail will be sent after people purchase tickets
item.name: Mustachio Bashio Benefit for Community Servings
